name: crazy mind reasons
description:
NOTE: DUE TO SOME BROWSERS LIMITATIONS CONCERNING AUTOMATIC COUND PLAING, YOU MAY NEED TO CLICK THE WINDOW AFTER THE GAME HAVE BEEN LOADED IN ORDER TO START IT.

a game made with scratch in 3 days for a little contest with friends.

it was supposed to have a story but i barely had the time to finish it, so i realize it was even more intriguing without story. i'll just let you know that every gameplay and level design elements had a purpose.

the music was made by sapht (https://soundcloud.com/sapht or https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8L-YO4YcFC-RkUFtlCPpXw) but i haven't asked him if i could use his music so...

the game is short, you can finish it in a matter of minutes and not really challenging, just enjoy playing while you can.

the "glich" at the end of level 4 is intended, it was also supposed to be a part of the story, you can interpret it as you like.

check it on scratch if you want to see the source: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/548439219/
